description: Crispy grilled fish, spiced pearl couscous and vibrant veggies, try this recipe for a healthier dinner that's ready in 20 minutes.
name: Healthier Moroccan-Inspired Pearl Couscous With Fish Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 640g firm white fish fillets, skin on

recipeInstructions.text: Bring tomatoes, paste, stock, paprika, turmeric, cumin and oregano to the boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in couscous. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, covered, for 12 minutes or until couscous is tender and sauce thickens.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Add fish and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until just cooked through. Season.
Cook broccolini in a saucepan of boiling water for 2 minutes or until just tender. Drain.
Divide couscous and broccolini among serving plates. Top with fish and serve with yoghurt.
